thread.title: McGhee near to Motherwell return

title: McGhee near to Motherwell return
text: McGhee near to Motherwell return Tuesday, 13 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) Motherwell are close to bringing Scotland assistant Mark McGhee back for a second spell as manager. Gordon Strachan to stick with Scotland after Tartan Army backing, Mark McGhee set for a Motherwell return...
